snippet.title: Swift: YouTube - How to Create a Slide-In Menu Part 3 - Lazy Var Explained (Ep 9)
snippet.description:
Lets finish up our slide in menu implementation by properly handling the setting after the dismissal animation.  As a bonus for today's video, we'll go over what it means to lazy instantiate a variable in Swift and how to use it effectively in our project.  Furthermore, I'll demo the usage of the debugger in Xcode to show how to quickly inspect variables during runtime. Enjoy!

How to create a Slide-In Menu Part 1: https://youtu.be/2kwCfFG5fDA

Part 2: 
https://youtu.be/PNmuTTd5zWc

How to create YouTube playlist: 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JGKdVUtA5xds1zcyzsz7HLj

Completed Source Code
